snippet.title: Mecha Force - Official Gameplay Trailer | Upload VR Showcase Winter 2023
snippet.description: See gameplay, combat against massive mechs, customization elements, and more in this new trailer for Mecha Force, an upcoming VR game that blends mecha action with a roguelike game. In Mecha Force, players are transported to a world in turmoil, where they must defend against both internal and external threats as they take control of their very own mecha. Mecha Force will be available in 2024 on Meta Quet and Steam VR.
